article_title: Treadwell targets Begich, but may face crowded GOP primary
article_text: "As I explore new opportunities and challenges in the next phase of my life, I intend to seek ways to continue to serve my fellow Alaskans," Sullivan wrote. Sullivan's biography says he's a lieutenant colonel in the Marine Corps Reserves, serving as executive officer of an anti-terrorism battalion. He just was recalled to active duty for a tour in Afghanistan, returning to Alaska a week ago then heading out to Japan, where he signed an agreement with one of the world's largest financiers of liquefied natural gas projects.

article_metadata.description: The U.S. Senate race heated up Thursday with Republican Mead Treadwell launching his campaign and the announcement that natural resources Commissioner Dan Sullivan is stepping down, sparking speculation that he's running too.

og.description: The U.S. Senate race heated up Thursday with Republican Mead Treadwell launching his campaign and the announcement that natural resources Commissioner Dan Sullivan is stepping down, sparking speculation that he's running too.
og.title: Treadwell targets Begich, but may face crowded GOP primary

article_summary:
"As I explore new opportunities and challenges in the next phase of my life, I intend to seek ways to continue to serve my fellow Alaskans," Sullivan wrote.
Sullivan's biography says he's a lieutenant colonel in the Marine Corps Reserves, serving as executive officer of an anti-terrorism battalion.
He just was recalled to active duty for a tour in Afghanistan, returning to Alaska a week ago then heading out to Japan, where he signed an agreement with one of the world's largest financiers of liquefied natural gas projects.
